title: Sui Kin Chi Ka Moku Dotten Amen SP Dance PV

synonyms: Kimi no Iro Special Dance Video
The Colors Within Special Dance Video
きみの色 劇中歌「水金地火木土天アーメン」描き下ろしSPダンスPV
alternative_titles.ja: 水金地火木土天アーメン SPダンスPV

synopsis:
Naoko Yamada-directed anime film Kimi no Iro (The Colors Within) released a special "dance" promotional video – though, it's a little more on-beat for the creator who enjoys showcasing her characters goofing around and showing their personality through movement.

The special dance trailer contains wholly original footage, presented in a TikTok-like format and follows the three main characters, Kimi, Totsuko and Rui, dancing along to the insert song "Sui Kin Chi Ka Moku Dotten Amen" with moves that are reminiscent of those popular with those who upload short-form dance videos.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)
